title: Elizabeth Hurley, 54, clings on to British summer in denim cut-offs and bikini top
text:
Elizabeth Hurley is back in a bikini. (Photo: Ian West/PA Images via Getty Images)

Words: Erin Donnelly and Francesca Specter

Summer may be on its way out, but not without one last bikini shot from Elizabeth Hurley.

The 54-year-old actress and swimsuit designer is marking the “last of the summer sun” in the UK with yet another steamy photo shoot for her fans.

While Britain is infamous for its drizzly, cold weather, Hurley, who is originally from Basingstoke, Hampshire, was celebrating a rare spell of sunshine in Herefordshire over the weekend.

Her Instagram post, shared with her 1.3 million followers on the platform, shows Hurley channelling Daisy Duke in short denim cut-offs and a plunging red bikini top from her eponymous beachwear line, Elizabeth Hurley Beach.

READ MORE: Elizabeth Hurley celebrates 54th birthday in a bikini

Per usual, the ‘Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery’ star was bombarded with compliments from awe-struck fans.

“Luv it,” an admirer wrote. “You're more gorgeous than any 25-year-old.”

“How do u not age? What a woman,” added another fan.

“God made you when he was thinking about bikini,” read another comment.

“You’re the reason the sun doesn’t want to leave,” one fan remarked, while another pronounced Hurley the “hottest woman on the planet.”

Given all this attention, will Hurley actually hang up her string bikinis for the off-season? And if she does, how will her fans ever cope?

While Liz’s seemingly never-ending stream of bikini-ed Instagram posts keep her firmly on her fans’ radars, her lookalike son, Damian Hurley, 17, has recently been sharing in the spotlight.

READ MORE: Elizabeth Hurley, 54, reveals go-to suncream

The teenager recently paid homage to his mother’s iconic Versace safety pin dress, in a photocall for the launch of Pat McGrath’s ‘Sublime Perfection: The System’ at Selfridges department store in London.

A muse for the celebrity make-up artist, Damian recently appeared in a promotional video as the face of her latest foundation launch – and people couldn’t stop talking about his resemblance to his famous mother.
description: The "hottest woman on the planet" is once again wowing fans with a sexy bikini photo shoot.
